name: Clockwork Cogs
description:
Well! After finishing the Code Jam 1, i rush to start and finish this Jam using Bitsy 3D.

Was funny making this game, and certainly i've learned a lot with this project.

I hope all you enjoy it!

Ah... I forgot, there is a bug when you climb the stairs. So slowly enter in the staircase and when you goes to the next floor, gently turn your aim. Sorry about that, but i didn't find a way to fix it in time!

Thanks for playing!
